questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A graffiti under a bridge

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) Under a bridge
C) Inside a museum
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) Graffiti under a bridge

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) Trees and plants
B) A person walking
C) Graffiti on a wall
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A car
B) A person
C) Graffiti artwork
D) A tree

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A clear blue sky
B) A river
C) Concrete structures
D) A bustling street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) Rocks and stones
C) Grass
D) A bench

What does the graffiti say?
A) "Keep Moving"
B) "Go with the flow"
C) "Stay Strong"
D) "Be Happy"

A) A bridge
B) A house
C) A skyscraper
D) A monument

What is the condition of the pipe visible in the photo?
A) New and shiny
B) Rusty and old
C) Broken
D) Painted

A) A wooden fence
B) A brick wall
C) A concrete wall
D) A metal sheet

A) Black

C) Red
D) Green

What is the dominant color of the graffiti?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black and white
D) Yellow

A) Detailed and colorful
B) Simple and monochromatic
C) Abstract and vibrant
D) Photorealistic

A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Metallic

A) It's a popular tourist spot
B) A graffiti under a bridge
C) It's a remote natural area

A) Paved and clean
B) Rocky and uneven

D) Sandy

A) Wooden beams
B) Steel cables
C) Concrete pillars
D) Brick arches

A) Water  
B) Trees  
C) Cars  
D) All of above

B) Metal
C) Concrete
D) Plastic

D) High-angle view

A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical

D) Central

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Yellow

What can be inferred about the area based on the graffiti?

A) The graffiti is on the bridge

A) "Art is life"
